body.p: Some respondents to the 2019 Exposure Draft raised concerns about the disclosure requirement in paragraph 28(f) of IAS 8 Accounting Policies, Changes in Accounting Estimates and Errors. This paragraph requires an entity, on the initial application of an IFRS (or amendments to an IFRS), to disclose, for the current period and each prior period presented, the amount of any adjustment for each financial statement line item affected.
